card.description: A survey from FiveThrityEight, asking people across the United States what foods they have for Thanksgiving dinner.

context.potentialUses: Predict whether someone will have a specific food for Thanksgiving, based on the region of the country they are from.
context.potentialMisuses: Trying to guess what region someone is from, just based on the foods they eat on Thanksgiving.

fields.description: The main dish served at the meal. Most likely turkey.
How the main dish was cooked, e.g. baked, roasted, fried.
If stuffing was served, what its major ingredient was, or none if no stuffing was served.
The kind of cranberry sauce served.
Whether or not gravy was served with the meal.
Whether or not brussel sprouts were served with the meal.
Whether or not carrots were served with the meal.
Whether or not cauliflower was served with the meal.
Whether or not corn was served with the meal.
Whether or not cornbread was served with the meal.
Whether or not fruit salad was served with the meal.
Whether or not a dish with green beans was served with the meal.
Whether or not mac and cheese was served with the meal.
Whether or not mashed potatoes were served with the meal.
Whether or not rolls or biscuits were served with the meal.
Whether or not squash was served with the meal.
Whether or not vegetable salad was served with the meal.
Whether or not yam casserole or sweet potato casserole was served with the meal.
Whether or not apple pie was served as a dessert.
Whether or not buttermilk pie was served as a dessert.
Whether or not cherry pie was served as a dessert.
Whether or not chocolate pie was served as a dessert.
Whether or not coconut cream pie was served as a dessert.
Whether or not key lime pie was served as a dessert.
Whether or not peach pie was served as a dessert.
Whether or not pecan pie was served as a dessert.
Whether or not pumpkin pie was served as a dessert.
Whether or not sweet potato pie was served as a dessert.
Whether or not apple cobbler was served as a dessert.
Whether or not blondies were served as a dessert.
Whether or not brownies were served as a dessert.
Whether or not carrot cake was served as a dessert.
Whether or not cheese cake was served as a dessert.
Whether or not cookies were served as a dessert.
Whether or not fudge was served as a dessert.
Whether or not ice cream was served as a dessert.
Whether or not peach cobbler was served as a dessert.
The part of the country the participant was from.
